tiles.title: Trumpets herald Music Centre
tiles.description: Trumpeters herald an important milestone in the development of the University's new Laidlaw Music Centre.

tiles.title: Aping our cousins
tiles.description: St Andrews scientists have found that young children use the same gestures as chimpanzees and gorillas.

tiles.title: LGBT+ life at St Andrews
tiles.description: For over 40 years the University has supported various LGBT groups at St Andrews who work to promote equality for all staff and students.
